title: Striking fossils of spiders, insects and fish tell the story of Australia's origins
description: The arid deserts and shrublands in Australia weren't always that way, according to a newly discovered and extraordinarily well-preserved fossil site in New South Wales.

title: Citigroup to fire unvaccinated US employees this month
description: Citigroup staff in the United States who have not been vaccinated against Covid-19 by Jan. 14 will be placed on unpaid leave and fired at the end of the month unless they are granted an exemption, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday.

title: Gordon Ramsay tells Kelly Clarkson how he pranked his daughter's boyfriend
description: Celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay stopped by "The Kelly Clarkson Show" and joked about crashing his 23-year-old daughter's date.

title: Dick Cheney just spoke a hard truth to his fellow Republicans
description: Dick Cheney is nobody's RINO (Republican in name only).

title: Kazakhstan leader gives 'kill without warning' order, as bodies lie in the streets
Nicolas Cage and wife Riko Shibata are expecting their first child together
description: Nicolas Cage and wife Riko Shibata are expecting their first child together, a spokesperson for the American actor confirmed to CNN Friday.

title: These stunning gas clouds of the Flame Nebula are where stars and planets are born
description: The Flame Nebula is one of many gems included in the Orion constellation, and astronomers have now captured a new perspective of this striking celestial feature. While the Flame Nebula appears to live up to its name, the fiery image actually represents what the interstellar clouds look like in radio waves.

title: Boy's discovery saves his family minutes before home is destroyed
description: A 9-year-old boy is credited with saving his family after alerting his parents to a fire that broke out in the home office.

title: Date My Daughter: Mom posts ad on Times Square billboard
description: A mom, with the help of a dating app, took out a billboard in Times Square in hopes of finding love for her daughter.

title: These precious family letters were left on a flight. Against all the odds, they came home
description: It's the stuff of travel nightmares. Taking something precious on your trip, keeping it close to hand so you don't risk losing it in checked baggage -- and then realizing you don't have it when you get home.

title: 'Mild' Covid-19 doesn't always feel that way
description: Many people are hearing from their doctors that they have a "mild" Covid-19 infection amid a surge of the highly contagious Omicron variant of the coronavirus, but your illness may not feel as minor as "mild" sounds.

title: Tim Cook's compensation jumped to nearly $100 million last year
description: Tim Cook had a very good year.

title: Ted Cruz told the truth about the Jan. 6 attack. Then he started backtracking
description: On Wednesday, Sen. Ted Cruz told the truth about what happened at the US Capitol on January 6, 2021, calling it "a violent terrorist attack on the Capitol, where we saw the men and women of law enforcement demonstrate incredible courage."

title: Sidney Poitier, the first Black man to win the best actor Oscar, dies at 94
description: Sidney Poitier, whose elegant bearing and principled onscreen characters made him Hollywood's first Black movie star and the first Black man to win the best actor Oscar, has died. He was 94.

title: Fox host spars with Ted Cruz on live TV over Jan. 6th. Keilar rolls the tape
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar rolls the tape on Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) after he appeared on Fox's Tucker Carlson Tonight to walk back comments he made calling the January 6 riot a "violent terrorist attack on the Capitol."

title: People desperate for Covid tests are turning to resellers online
description: When Patrick Kennedy, a nightlife performer in New York City, recently tested positive for Covid-19, he was desperate to find more rapid tests to not only monitor his health but track when he'd be able to return to work.

title: Big Tech could brush off rate hikes. Startups may struggle
description: Apple, Microsoft, SoFi and Coinbase all sold off sharply this week, as investors, anticipating higher interest rates, dumped tech stocks and bought shares of companies they believed were undervalued.

title: Why dancing may be the one New Year's resolution you actually keep in 2022
description: As a professionally trained dancer for nearly 20 years, I've found that a combination of pirouettes and leaps across the floor can leave me sweaty and breathing heavily on the other side -- but I often don't even notice it.

title: Andrew Garfield finally talks about that cameo you may not want to know about
description: Andrew Garfield is finally talking about his extended cameo in "Spider-Man: No Way Home."

title: Julia Fox talks unusual Kanye West date night
description: It was a very different way to go public with their dating, but according to Julia Fox so was their date.

title: Video shows what it was like inside the 'party plane' as Trudeau slams passengers
description: A group of people seen dancing, drinking and vaping maskless aboard a flight to Cancun are now stranded in Mexico after their return flight to Canada was scrubbed and other airlines have declined to fly them home.

title: Jon Stewart: 'Harry Potter' and JK Rowling are not 'anti-Semitic'
description: Comedian Jon Stewart is pushing back on a Newsweek article that said he accused "Harry Potter" author JK Rowling of anti-Semitism.

title: 'We're not thugs or terrorists': Kazakh protester responds to president's blame
description: Dozens of protesters were killed and hundreds injured during clashes in Kazakhstan, a police official from the largest city Almaty said, as troops from a Russian-led military alliance of post-Soviet states began their operations in the Central Asian country to help quell the unrest. CNN's Nic Robertson reports.

title: US Ryder Cup-winning captain Steve Stricker feels 'lucky' to be alive after serious illness
description: Steve Stricker, captain of the recent victorious US Ryder Cup team, says he feels "lucky" to be alive after a serious illness required time in hospital.

title: Aston Villa signs Philippe Coutinho on loan from Barcelona until the end of the season
description: Aston Villa has agreed to a deal with Barcelona to sign Philippe Coutinho on loan until the end of the season with an option to buy.

title: Archaeologists uncover ancient tombs of wealthy Chinese clan
description: A 3,000-year-old cemetery containing the tombs of a wealthy clan has been uncovered in central China following two years of excavation by archaeologists.

title: Anyone with Covid symptoms should assume they're positive and isolate, doctor says
description: With Covid-19 tests hard to find in many parts of the country and the Omicron variant spreading rapidly, health experts are advising those with symptoms to isolate themselves if they even only suspect they have the virus.

title: The 'anti-woke' crusade has come to Europe. Its effects could be chilling
description: If 2020 renewed calls for racial equality as Black Lives Matter protests exploded throughout Europe, 2021 brought in the backlash as parts of the political establishment waged a so-called "war against woke."

title: Hair loss treatment for votes? South Korea's hairy debate
description: South Korea's ruling party presidential candidate ignited a debate this week after he proposed allowing public healthcare insurance to cover hair loss treatment, fanning both cheers from some voters and criticism over his populist agenda.

title: Biden rediscovers his fighting spirit as he takes on Trump
description: In marking the anniversary of the Capitol insurrection, President Joe Biden rediscovered the sense of mission and political clarity that had disappeared when his presidency slumped during a cascade of crises in the second half of 2021.

title: India toxic gas leak kills 6 after illegal chemical dump
description: Six workers at a dyeing and printing mill in India were killed and more than 20 were taken to hospital on Thursday after inhaling toxic gas caused by an illegal dump of waste chemicals, officials said.

title: Jan. 6 investigators don't rule out concluding Trump's actions constituted a crime
description: Reps. Bennie Thompson and Liz Cheney, chair and vice chair of the House select committee investigating the January 6 insurrection, are not ruling out the possibility of concluding that the actions of former President Donald Trump and some of his associates constituted a crime.

title: Inside Biden's fiery Jan. 6 speech and his decision to confront Trump's danger head on
Los Angeles to host Super Bowl despite growing number of Covid-19 cases
description: The Super Bowl is expected to go ahead in Los Angeles next month despite the growing number of Covid-19 cases in the county.

title: Liz Cheney weighs in on potential Trump 2024 run
description: Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) tells CNN's Jake Tapper why she thinks former President Donald Trump should not be the Republican nominee for president in 2024.

title: Kelvin Harrison Jr. to star in new Jean-Michel Basquiat biopic
description: The short life and meteoric rise of artist Jean-Michel Basquiat will once again be told on the silver screen in an upcoming biopic directed by Nigerian American filmmaker Julius Onah.

title: Winter weather halts roadways as authorities work to clear 20-vehicle wreck
description: Kentucky State Police is working to clear what they say is a more than 20-car pile-up on the Western Kentucky Parkway due to winter weather conditions.

title: Death throes of a giant star witnessed by scientists for the first time ever
description: Astronomers were able to watch the unusually violent death of a red supergiant star for the first time. The observations completely change how they understand the final days of massive stars.

title: Fire at home converted into 2 apartments left 12 dead. Here's what we know
description: The flames erupted before sunrise Wednesday and the sound of emergency sirens alerted neighbors in the Fairmount area of Philadelphia that something was wrong. Shortly after, the devastating scale was clear: 12 people, including children, had died in a fire at a row home.

title: Biden's fiery speech was carefully planned
Kim Mi-soo, South Korean actress and model, dies at age 29
description: Kim Mi-soo, a South Korean actress who appeared in the Disney+ series "Snowdrop" and Netflix's "Hellbound," has died at the age of 29.

title: Partying passengers stuck in Mexico after airlines decline to fly them home
description: Some members of a rowdy group shown dancing, drinking and vaping maskless aboard a flight to Cancun find themselves stranded in Mexico after their return flight to Canada was scrubbed and other airlines have declined to fly them home.

title: 6,000 miles through 7 countries. Why companies are turning to long-haul trains
description: When the freight train pulled into view, it looked like many others at this rail hub in suburban Paris. But one thing made the train unusual: its journey started more than 6,000 miles away, in western China.
